text: Heo Gyun (Korean: 허균, Hanja: 許筠, 1569-1618) was a Korean writer, politician and poet during the Joseon Dynasty. His Chinese name was Danbo (단보, 端甫). Other names were Gyosan (교산, 蛟山), Seongso (성소, 惺所), Baikwolgeosa (백월거사, 白月居士). == Other websites == * http://100.naver.com/100.nhn?docid=188527 * http://navercast.naver.com/contents.nhn?contents_id=3377 * http://koreandb.nate.com/history/people/detail?sn=13504 Category:1569 births Category:1618 deaths Category:Korean poets Category:Executed people Category:Korean autobiographers
title: Heo Gyun
